actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to transfer St. Elizabeth Hospital to the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Transfers the supervision and administration of Saint Elizabeths Hospital from the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to the Commissioner of the District of Columbia, together with the statutory authority of the Secretary respecting the hospital and lands and buildings of the hospital. Provides for the transfer of all employees of the hospital with all rights, benefits, and privileges. Authorizes necessary appropriations in order to pay the District of Columbia part of the cost of operating and maintaining the hospital during the period of its integration into the programs of the District for the protection of mental health. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as may be necessary for remodeling and construction and repair at the hospital, except that the aggregate of such appropriations shall not exceed $43,000,000.

titles.title: A bill to transfer St. Elizabeth Hospital to the District of Columbia.
